coref_content: European Union ( EU ) regulator yesterday recommend approval of a once - a - day anti - hiv cocktail call Genvoya ( Gilead Sciences ) that be gentle on a patient bone and kidney than an early version of the drug. a decision by the US Food and Drug Administration ( FDA ) be just around the corner. a once - a - day anti - hiv cocktail call Genvoya ( Gilead Sciences ) combine elvitegravir, cobicistat, emtricitabine, and tenofovir alafenamide ( TAF ). the recipe match that for Stribild ( Gilead Sciences ), except that tenofovir alafenamide ( TAF ) replace the tenofovir disoproxil fumarate find in Stribild ( Gilead Sciences ). elvitegravir inhibit the hiv enzyme integrase, which in turn prevent the dna of hiv from integrate into the host genomic dna. cobicistat boost the effect of elvitegravir. both emtricitabine and tenofovir alafenamide ( TAF ) also work to prevent virus replication by inhibit an hiv enzyme call reverse transcriptase. a recent trial demonstrate that a once - a - day anti - hiv cocktail call Genvoya ( Gilead Sciences ) suppress hiv as well as Stribild ( Gilead Sciences ), but unlike Stribild ( Gilead Sciences ), a once - a - day anti - hiv cocktail call Genvoya ( Gilead Sciences ) do not reduce a patient bone mineral density as much. a once - a - day anti - hiv cocktail call Genvoya ( Gilead Sciences ) also do not have the renal toxicity associate with Stribild ( Gilead Sciences ). the well safety profile be chalk up to substitute tenofovir alafenamide ( TAF ) for the tenofovir disoproxil fumarate. nausea be the most common adverse effect for a once - a - day anti - hiv cocktail call Genvoya ( Gilead Sciences ), accord to a news release from the European Medicines Agency ( EMA ). the agency Committee for Medicinal Products for Human Use recommend that a once - a - day anti - hiv cocktail call Genvoya ( Gilead Sciences ) be indicate for treat adult and adolescent 12 year of age and old with a body weight of at least 35 kg who have hiv without any know mutation associate with resistance to emtricitabine or tenofovir. the Committee for Medicinal Products for Human Use recommendation now go to the European Commission, the European Unions executive branch, for final approval. More information on the committee action be available on the European Medicines Agency website. Gilead Sciences have ask the US Food and Drug Administration ( FDA ) also to approve a once - a - day anti - hiv cocktail call Genvoya ( Gilead Sciences ). a company spokesperson say a decision should come down in early November. Medscape Medical News © WebMD, LLC Heartwire © WebMD, LLC WebMD Health News © WebMD, LLC Reuters Health Information © send comment and news tip to news@medscape.net. cite this article :. Medscape. Sep 25, 2.

For starters, HIV is different from AIDS. HIV is the virus. AIDS is a condition brought by HIV. #StayNegatHIVe..
Monica Prasads book (Land of Too Much) makes a similar point in the intro, comparing the FDAs far stricter standards to EU drug regulators..

The banal evil of drug pricing  a new  column by NATHAN GEFFEN.
The banal evil of drug pricing  a new column by  NATHAN GEFFEN.
That pharmaceutical CEO from earlier this week who got heat for raising the cost of a drug Hes not an anomaly..
Anti-retroviral drugs a must in HIV cases, says WHO.
All people with #HIV should get anti-retroviral drugs:  by   via  #AIDS #TasP.
